nodes.text: A diplomatic mission to the planet Bimmisaari was undertaken by Han and Leia Solo in 9 ABY. However, the mission was never carried out as a Bimm traitor used the Solos' presence on Bimmisaari to attempt to hand them over to the Empire. Although they managed to escape an attack by Noghri Death Commandos, the collateral damage caused during the battle severely damaged future Bimm-New Republic relations.
